Package: org.jlab.analysis

[Groovy] Class Decays

    • org.jlab.analysis.Decays 
    • @groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class Decays
extends java.lang.Object

      Searches a hipo event for all unique decay combinations for a given set of Lund pids.

      Version:
      1.0
      Authors:
      Matthew McEneaney

        • protected DecayProduct getScatteredBeam()

          Find scattered beam with default limits on absolute value of chi2pid and on the status: |chi2pid|<3 && stat<=-2000.

          Returns:
          beam

        • protected DecayProduct getScatteredBeam(float chi2pid, int stat)

          Find scattered beam with limits on absolute value of chi2pid and on the staus. status limit looks for particles with status higher/lower than the limit depending on whether the status is positive/negative.

          Parameters:
          chi2pid
          stat
          Returns:
          beam

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeComboChargeList(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeList)

          Merge list of all unique decay particle combinations identified by charge with a combo list from another decay object.

          Parameters:
          mergeList
          Returns:
          mergedComboPidList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeComboChargeList(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer> recMatchingMap, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> mcFullParticleList)

          Merge list of all unique decay particle combinations from REC::Particle identified by charge using a mc matching map of REC::Particle to MC::Lund bank indices (not Lund indices) and the full list of MC::Lund particles. This essentially duplicates each particle in each combo list with an mc counterpart appended to the end of the combo list.

          Parameters:
          recMatchingMap
          mcFullParticleList
          Returns:
          mergedComboPidList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeComboPidList(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeList)

          Merge list of all unique decay particle combinations identified by Lund pid with a combo list from another decay object.

          Parameters:
          mergeList
          Returns:
          mergedComboPidList

        • protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct>> mergeComboPidList(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer> recMatchingMap, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> mcFullParticleList)

          Merge list of all unique decay particle combinations from REC::Particle using a mc matching map of REC::Particle to MC::Lund bank indices (not Lund indices) and the full list of MC::Lund particles. This essentially duplicates each particle in each combo list with an mc counterpart appended to the end of the combo list.

          Parameters:
          recMatchingMap
          mcFullParticleList
          Returns:
          mergedComboPidList

        • protected void setChargeList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each charge in specified decay channel.

        • protected void setComboChargeList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all possible decay particle combinations in event. Relies on this._charges and this._chargeList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setComboPidList(int dIndex, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> plist, java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> oldlist)

          Recursive helper function to create combo list for all possible decay particle combinations in event. Relies on this._decay and this._pidList (passed as plist argument the first time) being sorted. If these are not sorted this will NOT work!

          Parameters:
          dIndex
          oldlist

        • protected void setFullParticleList(java.util.ArrayList<DecayProduct> fplist)

          Set full list of particles in event. (Used for pid tagging events.)

          Parameters:
          fplist

        • protected void setFullParticleList()

          Set full list of particles in event. (Used for pid tagging events.)

        • protected void setParticleList()

          Set list of particles for event matching pids in this._decay.

        • protected void setParticleListByCharge()

          Set list of particles for event matching charges in this._charges.

        • protected void setPidList()

          Create list of lists of decay particles for each pid in specified decay channel.
